ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectContracts or agreements of a financial nature
PrecisOrder Amending Order in Council P.C. 2008-1921 of December 12, 2008, in order to (1) approve an increase in the authority to enter into derivative transactions to raise foreign currencies that would be used to purchase additional foreign reserve assets; (2) increase the derivative authority from C$70 billion to US$125 billion; and (3) amend the terms and conditions for the derivative transactions to allow the Minister of Finance to pledge cash or securities to secure the payment or performance of obligations arising out of these derivative transactions, in order to permit the Government to better manage the cost and risk of these transactions.
